mapper.select: select address_id, student_id, address, take_number, take_name, default_flag, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from sys_address where address_id = #{addressId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select address_id, student_id, address, take_number, take_name, default_flag, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from sys_address where student_id = #{student_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select address_id, student_id, address, take_number, take_name, default_flag, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from sys_address where student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and default_flag=#{defaultFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}
select address_id, student_id, address, take_number, take_name, default_flag, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from sys_address
